description:
Clef is the chief of all sorcerers in Cephiro, and was formerly Princess Emeraude`s attendant. He was appointed by the Emeraude to lead the Legendary Magic Knights to help finish the legend.
In the anime, he is turned to stone by Zagato shortly after being introduced to the three girls in the first episode, although he fights the spell and communicated with them through Mokona.
In the manga he is referred to as Guru Clef and is not turned to stone.
In the second series, he leads all of Cephiro until a new pillar can be found. He and all other magicians used their willpower to create a castle to hold the inhabitants of Cephiro. He almost lost his life when he used a strong spell to bring back all the Magic Knights from Lady Debonair and Innova.
name: Clef
